description:
Since the last battle, Miu`s slump hasn`t gone away and with PAINKILLER unable to advance, has further prolonged her state.  Miu` reckless drive to train, has left her body and spirit broken.  Miu finally cheers up when Koichi comes to visit...
Meanwhile, KATO-KIKAN has set up Spheres throughout the world on a large-scale trajectory to open up a multidimensional invasion.  It`s up to Shizuna and Izuna to convince the UN to take action...but will they listen?
Source: crunchyroll
